mapper.select: SELECT Ifnull(max(version),1) FROM service_objects WHERE tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND contract_no=#{contractNo} AND contract_branch_no=#{contractBranchNo} AND sequence_no=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_objects ( tenant_id, contract_no, contract_branch_no, sequence_no, data, version ) SELECT #{tenantId}, #{contractNo}, #{contractBranchNo}, Ifnull(max(sequence_no),0) + 1, #{data}, #{v} FROM service_objects WHERE tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND contract_no=#{contractNo} AND contract_branch_no=#{contractBranchNo} AND version=#{v}
